author: newsr.in
title: Snoop Dogg debuts Merry Jane, a community site around the cannabis lifestyle
text: SAN FRANCISCO — Rapper Snoop Dogg has built a new startup called Merry Jane, a community that’s centered around the cannabis lifestyle and business . It includes content from various partners including actor Seth Rogan. The site will launch in October and will only let 420 people into the site in beta. At the TechCrunch Disrupt […] »
